entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as sneering and making threats. He is also mentioned as moving towards Borgin and blocking the view of Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

entities.name: borgin
entities.description: Borgin is described as looking very frightened and being blocked from view by Malfoy.

entities.name: fenrir greyback
entities.description: Fenrir Greyback is mentioned as a family friend of Malfoy's who will be dropping in to make sure Harry, Ron, and Hermione are giving the problem their full attention.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as trying to keep Malfoy in sight along with Ron and Hermione.
